Manypeople experienced feelings of isolation as they sheltered at home during the COVID-19 pandemic.A sample PES statement for this shared experience is,Readiness for Enhanced Spiritual Well-Being as evidenced by expressed desire to enhance time outdoors. The nurse could encourage patients to visit local parks and walk outdoors while wearing a mask and maintaining social distancing
